    • Method Detail

      • toolSiteChanged

        public void toolSiteChanged(ToolConfiguration toolConfig)
        sets up the default perms for a tool. Uses the site id as the qualifier. Assumes that if no perms exist for the tool, the perms should be set to the defaults.
        Specified by:
        toolSiteChanged in interface ToolEventListener
        Overrides:
        toolSiteChanged in class SimpleToolPermissionManager
        Parameters:
        toolConfig -
